description.value: You grow a floating secondary seedpod you can use to fool other creatures. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Create a Diversion] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Feint]. Once every 10 minutes, you can deploy this lure as a move action. It remains deployed for 1 minute or until you Dismiss it. Any creature targeting you with an attack must attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5]; on a failure, the creature hits the seedpod lure instead of you, destroying it. A new one grows after 10 minutes of rest.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
